findings.title: Empty function
findings.description: Function _beforeTokenTransfer and its usages could be removed because this function is empty.

findings.title: add function issue
findings.description: If some LP token added to the contract twice using function add, then the total amount of reward rastaReward in function updatePool will be incorrect.

findings.title: Block gas limit
findings.description: The setRastaPerBlock function can fail due to block gas limit if the pool size is too big.
